Utility classes are classes that may come in handy when you quickly want to apply CSS rules to an element!

Test classes
Class Behaviour Usage
.show-elements Shows all element outlines On <body>
.test-block Adds a test-block to a column On columns


General utilities
Class Behaviour
.float-left float: left
.float-right float: right
.clearfix Wrap floating elements


Hiding and showing elements
Class Behaviour Active on breakpoint
.show display: block All
.hide display: none All
.show-pp display: block Phone Portrait
.show-pl display: block Phone Landscape
.show-tp display: block Tablet Portrait
.show-tl display: block Tablet Landscape
.show-dt display: block Desktop
.show-pp-inline display: inline Phone Portrait
.show-pl-inline display: inline Phone Landscape
.show-tp-inline display: inline Tablet Portrait
.show-tl-inline display: inline Tablet Landscape
.show-dt-inline display: inline Desktop
.show-pp-inline-block display: inline-block Phone Portrait
.show-pl-inline-block display: inline-block Phone Landscape
.show-tp-inline-block display: inline-block Tablet Portrait
.show-tl-inline-block display: inline-block Tablet Landscape
.show-dt-inline-block display: inline-block Desktop
.hide-pp display: none Phone Portrait
.hide-pl display: none Phone Landscape
.hide-tp display: none Tablet Portrait
.hide-tl display: none Tablet Landscape
.hide-dt display: none Desktop


Text-align classes
Class Align text Active on breakpoint
.text-center center All
.text-pp-center center Phone Portrait
.text-pl-center center Phone Landscape
.text-tp-center center Tablet Portrait
.text-tl-center center Tablet Landscape
.text-dt-center center Desktop
.text-left left All
.text-pp-left left Phone Portrait
.text-pl-left left Phone Landscape
.text-tp-left left Tablet Portrait
.text-tl-left left Tablet Landscape
.text-dt-left left Desktop
.text-right right All
.text-pp-right right Phone Portrait
.text-pl-right right Phone Landscape
.text-tp-right right Tablet Portrait
.text-tl-right right Tablet Landscape
.text-dt-right right Desktop


Flexbox classes
Class Behaviour Usage
.display-flex Set display: flex; On parent
.row-flex Set display: flex; On row
.items-center-h Center items horizontally On container
.items-center-v Center items vertically On container
.items-top Align items to top On container
.items-left Align items to left On container
.items-right Align items to right On container
.items-bottom Align items to bottom On container
.items-baseline Align items to baseline On container
.items-spaced-around Distribute items evenly On container
.items-spaced-between Distribute items to edges On container
.item-top Align to top On child
.item-bottom Align to bottom On child
.item-baseline Align to baseline On child
.item-center-v Align to center vertically On child
.item-center-h Align to center horizontally On child
.item-first Reorder item to be the first On child
.item-last Reorder item to be the last On child
